Title: Provides that the amount of a STAR real property tax savings may not be less than the amount of the STAR real property tax savings from the previous year
Summary: Provides that the amount of a STAR real property tax savings may not be less than the amount of the STAR real property tax savings from the previous year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing that the amount of a STAR real property tax savings may not be less than the amount of the STAR real property tax savings from the previous year
